```{r xy_plot, echo = FALSE}
#knitr chunk options
knitr::opts_chunk$set(fig.width = 8,
                      fig.height = 8,
                      fig.align = "center",
                      fig.path ='./figures/',
                      dev = 'svg')
data("anscombe")
library(tidyr)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
anscombe.nu <- select(anscombe, x1, y1)
anscombe.nu
plot(anscombe.nu$y1~anscombe.nu$x1,
     main = "Anscombe Scatterplot",
     xlab = "x1",
     ylab = "y1",
     ylim = c(3,12),
     xlim = c(3, 15),
     pch = 24)
abline(lm(y1~x1, data = anscombe), col = "green")
```
